1.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta: Dirty Little Secrets
1.plot: Catch up with the cast of Love and Hip Hop Atlanta and see never-before-seen footage, casting tapes, interviews, bloopers, and deleted scenes from this past season.

2.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta: Dirty Little Secrets 2
2.plot: In this hour-long special, the cast and producers of Love and Hip Hop Atlanta reveal some of the most surprising and jaw-dropping secrets from the hit series.

3.title: Love & Hip Hop Hollywood: Dirty Little Secrets
3.plot: This hour-long special highlights never-before-seen, exclusive footage from Seasons 1-3 of Love and Hip Hop Hollywood. Producers and the cast comment on original casting tapes, outtakes, and more.

4.title: Love & Hip Hop New York: Dirty Little Secrets
4.plot: Love and Hip Hop New York: Dirty Little Secrets is an hour long special highlighting never-before-seen, exclusive footage from the first seven seasons of Love and Hip Hop.

imdb.plot outline: Dirty Little Secrets is an hour long special highlighting never-before-seen, exclusive footage from each of the Love and Hip Hop franchises. The footage includes original casting tapes, outtakes, and plenty of deleted/extended scenes. Producers and the cast share never-before-revealed stories about the production process and comment on footage, some of which even they have never seen before. The result is an intimate, scandalous, and very funny look into the world of Love and Hip Hop, exposing all of the Dirty Little Secrets.
imdb.title: Dirty Little Secrets
plot: _Dirty Little Secrets_ (qv) is an hour long special highlighting never-before-seen, exclusive footage from each of the Love and Hip Hop franchises. The footage includes original casting tapes, outtakes, and plenty of deleted/extended scenes. Producers and the cast share never-before-revealed stories about the production process and comment on footage, some of which even they have never seen before. The result is an intimate, scandalous, and very funny look into the world of Love and Hip Hop, exposing all of the _Dirty Little Secrets_ (qv).
